home.title: Eventify - Organize and Attend Thematic Meetings with Expert Speakers
home.description: Discover, organize, and attend thematic meetings with expert speakers in cafes and restaurants. Explore upcoming events and sign up today!

events.title: Upcoming Events - Eventify
events.description: Browse through upcoming thematic meetings and events. Join us for insightful sessions with expert speakers in cozy locations.

create.title: Create Your Event - Eventify
create.description: Step into Eventify’s intuitive event creation page. In just a few clicks, set up and customize your event, reach a wider audience, and make an impact. Your journey from idea to a fully organized thematic meeting starts here!

places.title: Places - Eventify
places.description: Browse through our places store. Join us for insightful sessions with expert speakers in cozy locations.

create.title: Create Your Place - Eventify
create.description: Step into Eventify’s intuitive place creation page. In just a few clicks, set up and customize your place, reach a wider audience, and make an impact. Your journey from idea to a fully organized thematic meeting starts here!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - Your Data is Safe with Eventify
privacy.description: At Eventify, we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. Read our detailed privacy policy to understand how we collect, use, and safeguard your data, ensuring a secure and transparent experience.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions: Your Guide to Eventify's Policies
terms.description: Get acquainted with Eventify's Terms & Conditions. This page outlines our policies, ensuring transparency and clarity for all users. Read more to understand our guidelines.

cookie.title: Your Data, Your Control: Eventify's Cookie Policy
cookie.description: Discover how Eventify utilizes cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Our Cookie Policy page details their use, ensuring transparency and control over your data.

price.title: Speaker Subscriptions: Choose Your Plan with Eventify
price.description: Amplify your impact with Eventify's speaker subscription plans. From basic to pro, find the perfect tier for your speaking journey. Join us and expand your influence today!

hero.slug:
Choose free locations
Organize events,
And earn!
hero.description: Eventify is a platform for organizing thematic meetings with speakers in cafes and restaurants.

places.new_place_creating: Adding a site to the platform
places.new_place_general_description: Provide a basic info about your place
places.new_places_was_not_created_description: Your premise wasn't created, please, review the steps
places.general_type_of_premises: Specify the type of event space
places.general_type_of_premises_helper: Please indicate the type of premises that most accurately reflects it.
places.general_title: Give your event space a name
places.general_title_placeholder: Loft in the center with a view of the city panorama
places.general_title_helper:
Grab the guest's attention and describe your space with a headline without including your business name.
Try including the following items:
Location - urban, city center, harbor.
Type of space - loft, studio, dance hall, penthouse.
Unique adjectives - industrial, rustic, spacious.
places.general_description: Add a description of your event space
places.general_description_placeholder: Please describe your event venue (minimum 280 characters).
places.general_description_helper:
Please include details about your premises so that guests have a full understanding of what the property offers.
Try to answer the following questions:
What types of events are suitable for your location?
What is the layout of the space and how can you best organize the use of its different zones?
What features or amenities are available in your space?

Do not include:
Personal contact information - Do not include your contact information, such as phone number, organization name, address, email, or links to a personal website.
places.general_rules: What rules apply in your premises?
places.general_rules_helper:
Please provide some rules regarding what activities are and are not acceptable in the area.
Example:
Smoking is prohibited inside the building.
Outside food orders are permitted.
Drinking alcohol is prohibited after 20:00.
Exception:
Cleaning Fee - Basic cleaning is the responsibility of the unit owner. In case you decide to charge additional cleaning fees, you can clarify this information in the following section.
places.general_area: What size room can guests book? (m²)
places.general_area_helper: Please only indicate the size of the room guests can use when booking.
places.general_min_capacity_helper: You must specify the number of guests
places.general_max_capacity_helper: You must specify the number of guests
places.general_age_restrictions: Who is allowed into your premises?
places.general_age_restrictions_helper: Typically, age restrictions only apply to establishments that serve alcohol.
places.features_parking_area: Please provide information about parking options
places.features_parking_area_helper: Is there parking in your area or nearby?
places.features_camera_or_audio_recoding_helper: Are there CCTV or audio recording systems in the premises?
places.features_does_premises_have_wifi: Is there WiFi in the premises?
places.features_wifi_credentials: Please provide your Wi-Fi login and password
places.features_wifi_credentials_helper: Make internet access more convenient for your guests by providing them with Wi-Fi connection information. This information will only be available to guests after they have booked the room.
places.features_amenities_helper: Any amenities you select must be included in your hourly rate. If you have additional services that require an additional fee, please do not list them here. These may be added in the next section.
places.new_place_location_helper: Your premises address will not be publicly displayed on your Eventify page. It will only be available to guests once they have made a reservation.
places.location_use_same_billing_address: Can this address be used for billing?
places.location_route_to_premises_helper:
Help your guests and event participants find you.
Try including the following information:
The route to your space, how to access the building, the buttons to open the doors, the floor your space is on, the ability to use stairs and the elevator.
places.pricing_cleaning_fee: Is the cleaning fee included in the hourly rate?
places.pricing_cleaning_fee_helper: You are responsible for cleaning after each booking. You may charge a fee to cover the costs involved.
places.pricing_rental_price_by_hour_helper: Please select a base hourly rate. After creating your ad, you can adjust your prices to account for the cost of participation and additional services.

auth.signup_helper: By clicking the "Register" button, you accept the <partnerAgreement>Partner Agreement</partnerAgreement>, confirm that you have read the <personalDataPolicy>Personal Data Processing Policy</personalDataPolicy>, and give <personalDataProcess>Consent to the processing of personal data</personalDataProcess>

basic_info_form.social_links_helper: Enter your social media accounts so we can verify your account.

venues.heading: My venues
venues.no_premises: Venue is inactive. A hall needs to be added.
venues.no_organization_warn_msg: To be able to add venues and halls, please fill out your personal information in the "Profile" section.

fields.name: Name
fields.description_placeholder: Add a description for your venue
fields.photo_tip: Add one photo that will be displayed on the venue page.
fields.photo_tip_extra: The size of the photo should not exceed {size} mb
fields.locationTutorial_tip: Write a guide on how to get to you. It will be visible to all users and it will be easier for them to find you.
fields.locationTutorial_placeholder: For example: You can get there by taking the tram #2 and #5. From the stop "Ozernaya" walk to the large brick building. Enter from the back. On the third floor turn right and follow the signs.

errors.alreadyExistsError: A venue with this name already exists
errors.email_required: This is not a valid email

created.complete_label: You have successfully registered the venue.
created.no_premise_warn_msg: Next, you need to register at least one hall to be rented on this site.

fields.address_tip: The premise address is the same as the venue location address. To make it easier for visitors to find a specific premise, provide additional address information.
fields.amenities_tip: Select at least 5 amenities available in your premise. The more amenities you select, the more users can find your premise.
fields.open_hours_example:
This form allows you to specify the cost of your hall per hour. It means that you can set different prices for different time intervals.

For example:
<bold>10:00-14:00 - 50 zl</bold>,
<bold>14:00-23:00 - 70 zl</bold>.

If the cost of your hall does not change during the day, it is recommended to fill it in like this:
<bold>10:00-23:00 - 50 zl</bold>
fields.open_hours_existing_range_error_msg: Cannot add. Intersection with existing interval: {start} - {end}
fields.open_hours_spread_mode: You can set these operating hours for the rest of the week
fields.open_hours_discounts_heading: Do you plan to offer discounts during a single day?
fields.open_hours_discounts_tip: If you plan to offer a discount, specify its conditions. The discount is given only for bookings of several hours and is valid only for one day.
fields.open_hours_discounts_helper: for bookings of {duration, plural, =1 {# hour} other {# hours}} or more
fields.rules_tip: Describe all rules of your hall

errors.photos_required: At least one photo is required
errors.areaMin_required: The area must be at least 3 square meter
errors.areaMax_required: The area must be no more than 100000 square meters
errors.capacityMin_required: The capacity must be at least 1
errors.capacityMax_required: The capacity must be a positive number
errors.openHours_required: You must add working hours and price for at least one day
errors.amenities_required: Should be chosen at least 5 amenities
errors.rulesMin_required: The amount of symbols for rules should be at least 10

premise_types.special_events_etc: Banquet halls, estates for weddings, etc

booking_cancel_terms.very_flexible_desc: Guests have the ability to cancel their booking no later than 24 hours before the event and receive a full refund, including all fees paid for the reservation.
booking_cancel_terms.flexible_desc: Guests have the ability to cancel their booking no later than 7 days before the event and receive a full refund of the booking, including any applicable fees, minus any fees paid for the booking. However, bookings cancelled less than 24 hours before the event are not eligible for a refund.
booking_cancel_terms.default_30_desc: Bookings can be cancelled by guests up to 30 days before the event, at which point the full amount paid for the booking, including all applicable fees, will be refunded. If a cancellation is made within the 30-7 day period before the event, guests will receive a 50% refund of the booking amount (less any applicable fees). Bookings cancelled within 7 days of the event are not eligible for a refund.
booking_cancel_terms.default_90_desc: Bookings can be cancelled by guests up to 90 days before the event, at which point the full amount paid for the booking, including all applicable fees, will be refunded. If a cancellation is made within the 90-14 day period before the event, guests will receive a 50% refund of the booking amount (less any applicable fees). Bookings cancelled within 14 days of the event are not eligible for a refund.

filters.variants_found: By your request {total, plural, =0 {nothing has found} =1 {found one variant} other {found # variants}}
